meanings.definition: A device used to sharpen pencils.
meanings.sent1: I used the sharpeners in class to make my pencil pointy.
meanings.sent2: The teacher handed out sharpeners to the students who needed them.
meanings.sent3: The sharpeners on the desk were always in high demand during exams.
meanings.sent4: Her precision in using the sharpeners was like an artist at work.
meanings.sent5: The bright red sharpeners stood out on the dull classroom table.

meanings.definition: A tool used to sharpen knives.
meanings.sent1: The chef's sharpeners were essential for keeping the kitchen knives sharp.
meanings.sent2: He bought a new set of sharpeners to maintain his collection of knives.
meanings.sent3: The sharpeners in the kitchen drawer were always mysteriously missing.
meanings.sent4: The sharpeners gleamed in the sunlight, ready for their daily task.
meanings.sent5: The old sharpeners had seen many knives pass through their blades.

meanings.sent1: The sharpeners at the fair could sharpen anything from scissors to axes.
meanings.sent2: She hired a professional sharpeners to sharpen her gardening tools.
meanings.sent3: The sharpeners had a twinkle in his eye as he worked on each blade.
meanings.sent4: The sharpeners' hands moved swiftly, expertly honing the edges.
meanings.sent5: The village relied on the sharpeners to keep their tools in top shape.
